SVGAttributeMarker-mid.summary: The marker-mid attribute defines the arrowhead or polymarker that will be drawn at all interior vertices of the given shape.

remarks.para: The marker is rendered on every vertex other than the first and last vertices of the path data.

blockquote.para: Note: As a presentation attribute, marker-mid can be used as a CSS property.

remarks.para: You can use this attribute with the following SVG elements:
